document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Bring </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">sunset </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">cup </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Reckon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">morning's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">flagons </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">up </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">say </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">dew! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">far </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">morning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">leaps, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">time </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">weaver </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">sleeps </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">spun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">breadths </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">blue! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Write </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">notes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">new </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Robin's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">extasy </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Among </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">astonished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">boughs! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">trips </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Mullet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">makes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Cups </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Bee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">partakes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Debauchee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Dews! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Also </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">laid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Rainbow's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">piers? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Also </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">leads </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">docile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">spheres </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">withs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">supple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">blue? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">fingers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">string </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">stalactite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">counts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">wampum </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">night </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">none </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">due? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">built </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Alban </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">house </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">shut </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">windows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">close </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">spirit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">cannot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who'll </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">out </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">gala </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">day </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">implements </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">fly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Passing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Pomposity? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Bring me the sunset in a cup
